body:
Comment 2: 
The BIN variable is handled by including Make.cmd instead of Make.pkg.

The others are not the intended usage of the tools.
Instead of going to all that work, it is far easier to
just install into the standard location under a
unique name like TARG=mypackages/util.

That's the usage we'd like to promote.
_Status changed to **WorkingAsIntended**._
